name: Erinandout.github.io
tagline: Good friends, and their traveling plans.
body:
### Road to Nowhere [The Talking Heads](http://youtu.be/AWtCittJyr0)
### Aside from all the spiritual stuff, my good friend and I plan on getting as much fresh air as possible. From what I've heard Forest Park will be a great place to do just that!![](http://www.portlandmonthlymag.com/data/images/2012/7/image/4442/forest-park-wildwood-bridge.jpg)
### Time outside to unwind will be absolutely necessary as my friend and I start new careers in computer programming.![](http://wbbw1.bwbx.io/cms/2012-01-26/tech_coding05__01__600.jpg)
### We both happen to be huge fans of beauty. Anyone can have beauty in their lives if they know where to look. No doubt we will find ourselves here from time to time.![](http://img.timeinc.net/time/2010/portland_tavel/portland_rose_garden.jpg)
### And possibly here...![](http://img.timeinc.net/time/2010/portland_tavel/portland_strip_club.jpg)KIDDING!!!
### ![](http://payload.cargocollective.com/1/1/40622/624129/Portland_Bridges_WEB_2000.jpg)Bridges symbolize two things that have been brought together; be it two ideas, two people, or two land-masses, bridges truly keep us connected!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
